  • Uses of Tile in Model

    Methods in Model that return Tile
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Tile
    Board.getClosestDealBuyer​(Tile startingTile)
    Accessor: Returns the Tile that is closest to the startingTile and is also a Deal or Buyer Tile Precondition: 0<=startingTile.getOrderNumber()<=32 Postcondition: The Tile is returned
    Tile
    Player.getCurrentTile()
    accessor:Returns the currentTile of the player
    Postcondition: returns currentTile of the player
    Tile
    PlayerADT.getCurrentTile()
    accessor:Returns the currentTile of the player
    Postcondition: returns currentTile of the player
    Tile
    Board.getTile​(int i)
    Accessor: Returns the Tile that is in the i-th position of the ArrayList Precondition: 0<=i<=32 Postcondition: The Tile is returned
    Methods in Model that return types with arguments of type Tile
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<Tile>
    Board.getBoard()
    Accessor: Returns the ArrayList that contains all the Tiles Postcondition: The Tile is returned
    Methods in Model with parameters of type Tile
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Tile
    Board.getClosestDealBuyer​(Tile startingTile)
    Accessor: Returns the Tile that is closest to the startingTile and is also a Deal or Buyer Tile Precondition: 0<=startingTile.getOrderNumber()<=32 Postcondition: The Tile is returned
    void
    Player.setCurrentTile​(Tile tile)
    transformer: moves the player to a new tile
    precondition: the tile is not null
    postcondition: the currentTile of the player has changed the tile of the parameter
    void
    PlayerADT.setCurrentTile​(Tile tile)
    transformer: moves the player to a new tile
    precondition: the tile is not null
    postcondition: the currentTile of the player has changed the tile of the parameter

  • Uses of Tile in Model.Tiles

    Subclasses of Tile in Model.Tiles
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BuyerTile
    Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
    class 
    DealTile
    Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
    class 
    FamilyCasinoTile
    Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
    class 
    LotteryTile
    Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
    class 
    MessageTile
    Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round, and there is an extra member that holds how many message cards should be opened
    class 
    PaydayTile
     
    class 
    RadioTile
    Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
    class 
    StartTile
    Subclass of Tile, is this subclass the tileAction method is empty as the starting tile has no action
    class 
    SweepTakesTile
    Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
    class 
    YardSaleTile
    Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round

  • Uses of Tile in View

    Methods in View with parameters of type Tile
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    GraphicUI.movePawnToTile​(Pawn pawn, Tile tile)
    Transformer: Moves one of the pawns to a new tile
    Precondition: The pawn and the tile must not be null
    Postcondition: The pawn has been moved
